Talk_01_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I heard that <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> was sighted
at Hyrule Castle, which has me all kinds
of curious.
But it's my job to care for the horses
properly so those who go out searching
have healthy transport.
I'll leave the business regarding Princess
Zelda to everyone else.
Talk_01_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_00>And thanks for your help with this little
project, son. <sp:5:0:0>Looks great.

Now we can board horses at Lookout
Landing. If you need help with <clr:0000>horses<clr:ffff>,
please talk to me anytime.
Talk_01_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive_01>I heard that <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> was
seen recently.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But first things first. I need to finish up
my work!
Talk_01_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>Are you interested in horses?
Unfortunately our <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff> here is
under construction.
If you want to register or take any horses
out, you'll need to use one of the other
nearby <clr:0000>stables<clr:ffff>.
Talk_00_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Karson, when do you think the <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff>
will be ready?
Talk_01_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Thanks for helping out! <sp:5:0:0>I was having a
hard time figuring out how to fit it.

With the roof done, all that's left is to add
the finishing touches! I'll get cracking.
<sp:5:0:0>Son and done!
Talk_00_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sigh>Well, until the <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff> is ready, we can't
board any more horses. What a shame.
Talk_01_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Can't say I'm surprised, considering
you're <clr:0000>Hudson Construction<clr:ffff>'s
number one.
Talk_00_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Tired_01>I need to get the last of the <clr:0000>roof planks<clr:ffff>
correctly fitted.
Talk_01_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Chat_00>Around here, the closest one is
<clr:0000>New Serenne Stable<clr:ffff> to the west.
Talk_01_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming_01>♪Quick and quality, blink and we're
done. That's why everyson chooses
Hudson Constructiooon.♪<sp:5:1:0>
Okey dokes! <sp:5:1:0>Feeling pumped! Gonna get
this done in one fell swoop.
Talk_01_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Ah yes, this is where we care for
the horses.

<sp:3:0:2:0300>Normally we can <clr:0000>board<clr:ffff> travelers' precious
<clr:0000>horses <clr:ffff>here, but with an incomplete
<clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff>, there's only so much we can do.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So if you're in a hurry, please use one of
the other nearby <clr:0000>stables<clr:ffff> for now.
Talk_01_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sigh>Apologies, but this <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff> is currently
under construction.

If you need help with horse handling,
please use one of the other
nearby <clr:0000>stables<clr:ffff>.
Talk_00_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>I heard that <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> has been
sighted.

That news is making it challenging to
focus on the task at hand...
Talk_01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Tired_01>I want to finish up construction on the
<clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff>, but I'm not sure how best to
tackle fitting this <clr:0000>roof plank <clr:ffff>in...
Talk_01_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Travelers come by here often, so there's
a lot of <clr:0000>requests for horses<clr:ffff>.

I do wish I could build the <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff> in our
classic son-and-done fashion...
Talk_01_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>With things as they are now, I really feel
for the horses... <sp:5:1:0>Hm?
